Code Execution and Manipulation: Observe that the path '/' lists information including server source code.

Form Interactions and Inputs: Identify the `/api/toylist` endpoint and its behaviour.
We cannot reach the '/queries' endpoint as the IP address required is 127.0.0.1, any other IP is redirected to '/'.
